__e: For a minute, he had me wondering if you were making this whole thing up.
Either you're seeing somebody behind my back which would make you the world's biggest jerk or you're pretending to see somebody which makes you so pathetic I could cry right here!
I think you're making all of this up because you want me to stop liking her because you like her now.
No, he just doesn't want to go home to his empty house, and so he keeps coming up with lamer and lamer excuses to work late.
Ben, she's already mad at me 'cause she thinks I'm a liar... which I am, and I can't keep coming up with excuses... every time I have to run errands for the devil.
I keep making these excuses; that it's my dad, it's my work, when really... it's you.
However, sometimes he seems so knowledgeable that I get suspicious he's making it all up!
Matt knew that I wasn't happy there, and I knew that Lee thought I was making up stories.
That's why people don't go around making invention every other day.
I figured he's probably been inventing things on the other side, so hopefully he'll bring something to us.
That's how I knew the kid was blowing smoke.
And I don't want him to worry, so... I'm making an excuse.
Are you telling me I was actually born on mom's birthday, and she's been lying to me my entire life, making up some random date so she could selfishly not share her special day with me?
You don't really want to come with me, so you're inventing a reason not to.
Whether it's a mistake, you're blameless, but it could get awkward because some woman is making up stories.
Well, regardless... I thought you weren't supposed to be doing this any more, making up stories.
He said that wasn't anybody else's business, that I made myself look bad telling stories like that, that I made him look bad.
